comment: What is a good modern symbol for nurses ? Hats seem dated , and not a good symbol for critical thinking etc . Needles etc . Can be used by various roles . Should we have an image that means ' nurse ' ?
amr:
# ::snt What is a good modern symbol for nurses ? Hats seem dated , and not a good symbol for critical thinking etc . Needles etc . Can be used by various roles . Should we have an image that means ' nurse ' ?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / symbolize-01
            :ARG1 (n / nurse)
            :ARG2 (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
            :ARG1-of (m2 / modern-02))
      :snt2 (s2 / seem-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / date-02
                        :ARG1 (h / hat))
                  :op2 (s3 / symbolize-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 h
                        :ARG2 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (t / think-01
                                    :manner (c / criticism-04))
                              :op2 (e / et-cetera)))))
      :snt3 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (r / role
                        :mod (v / various))
                  :ARG1 (e2 / et-cetera)))
      :snt4 (r2 / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-03
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (ii / image
                        :ARG1-of (m3 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (n2 / nurse))))
            :polarity a))

comment: Universities still provide pin badges during the celebration events / pinning ceremonies . I think badges may have been widely worn in the past . Perhaps a return to wearing badges from the awarding institutions could be a good symbol . I currently wear mine .
amr:
# ::snt Universities still provide pin badges during the celebration events / pinning ceremonies . I think badges may have been widely worn in the past . Perhaps a return to wearing badges from the awarding institutions could be a good symbol . I currently wear mine .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / provide-01
            :ARG0 (u / university)
            :ARG1 (b / badge
                  :mod (p2 / pin))
            :mod (s / still)
            :time (a / and
                  :op1 (e / event
                        :mod (c / celebrate-01))
                  :op2 (c2 / ceremony
                        :mod (p3 / pin))))
      :snt2 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p4 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (w / wear-01
                        :ARG1 (b2 / badge)
                        :ARG1-of (w2 / wide-02)
                        :time (p5 / past))))
      :snt3 (p6 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / symbolize-01
                  :ARG1 (r / return-01
                        :ARG1 (w3 / wear-01
                              :ARG1 (b3 / badge
                                    :source (ii2 / institution
                                          :ARG0-of (a2 / award-01)))))
                  :ARG1-of (g / good-02)))
      :snt4 (w4 / wear-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :poss ii3)
            :time (c3 / current)))
